name: "Nurse"
specialText: As many nurses can operate in a city as there are open routes.

name: "Nurse"

name: Steelclaw
flavor: They call him Steelclaw, but they spell it incorrectly. Stealclaw got his name because he was declawed as a pup.

name: Swearwolf
flavor: I am a werewolf, I swear it on me mam's grave.
specialText: Eaten and removed if Fang hired by hiring front. Only one Swearwolf can operate in a city.

name: Swearwolf
flavor: I am a werewolf, I swear it on me mam's grave.
specialText: Eaten and removed if Fang hired by hiring front. Only one Swearwolf can operate in a city.

name: "Hatchet" Murray
flavor: The nickname Hatchet Murray is a misnomer, technically he uses an axe.

name: Pup
flavor: I like my biology tutor. He was delicious!

name: Ghoul
flavor: I am not a zombie, I don't associate with that riff-raff!

name: Haunted
specialText: Can move through token blocked cities

name: Soldier
flavor: They call him the Brigadier, nobody knows what exactly it means, but he keeps saying it's a rank.

name: Renfield
specialText: Can be traded in for Count Dracula (when available) for 200

name: Werewolf
flavor: No, I don't need a flea collar!

name: Werewolf
flavor: No, I don't need a flea collar!

name: Werewolf
flavor: No, I don't need a flea collar!

name: Vampire
flavor: Ah, 1742, an excellent year, you can taste the white blood cells from the plague.

name: Vampire
flavor: Ah, 1742, an excellent year, you can taste the white blood cells from the plague.

name: The Headless Duke
specialText: Can move through token blocked cities

name: Doctor Frankenstein
flavor: No, he's my monster, I'm Frankenstein, you halfwit!
specialText: Does not require a token on route.

name: Count Vlad
specialText: Can jump once between two tokens belonging to the employer during the route

name: Count Dracula
specialText: Can use Dracula's Moving Castle as a token

name: Duke Lupin
specialText: Can visit all cities with front’s tokens and all immediately adjacent open routes. Does not prevent route being covered by another monster.
